channel.title: Are there any village leaders willing to help me with the trade mission?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Are there any village leaders willing to help me with the trade mission?"

item.title: Re: Are there any village leaders willing to help me with the trade mission?
item.content:encoded: Just hit any Kage who is in your range. The Kage doesn't need to be unbingo'd for you to get the Trade. Well, it was like that before but it was changed a long time ago.

item.title: Re: Are there any village leaders willing to help me with the trade mission?
item.content:encoded: As I remember, the only time a bingo target has to be unbingo'ed is for the Note, you can hit bingo'ed kages for the Trade.

item.title: Re: Are there any village leaders willing to help me with the trade mission?
item.content:encoded: just pick a weak one try Thought Village :)

item.title: Are there any village leaders willing to help me with the trade mission?
item.content:encoded: If any are willing and not already bingo'ed, i would really appreciate it.
